data.header: He's eternally in love with Fox News
data.msg: By now almost everyone knows he loves Fox News, but this time, he especially tweeted about Eli Lake/Bloomberg's report on Ex-Obama adviser Susan Rice unmasked Trump associates, by quoting Fox News.
